attributes.additional_details: We, the people, have had enough. Covid measures are being spiralled out of control. The government has not got our best interests at heart. They have been consistently wrong. The vaccine does not stop you catching a covid variant nor does it stop you spreading it.
attributes.background: We, the people, have had enough!!! We want an end to the travel restrictions. We want an end to the privacy invasions. We want an end to the untested vaccine pushing on our citizens!! No more Covid measures!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592632
